document_data.name: Udlara's Camel Emporium
document_data.mainbody: '''Udlara's Camel Emporium''' was a camel-selling and rental business owned by [[Udlara Thaerintauhn]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Udlara's Emporium was across the bazaar in the [[Bitter Well (Anauroch)|Bitter Well]] oasis.
document_data.Structure: The tent appeared rather worn down, but it was actually an enchanted tent, called ''[[Udlara's tent]]''.
document_data.Interior: The interior was actually clean, spacious, and well-lit.
document_data.Services: Udlara sold [[camel]]s and camel-related services. Depending on their opinion of the buyer, the asking price for a camel could go from 45 to 80 [[gp]].
document_data.Defenses: The magical properties of the tent made it difficult to damage without using magical weapons; even those had to be stronger than the bare minimum in order to deal damage.
document_data.History: Udlara's Camel Emporium had made arrangements with [[Cormyr]] to supply some of their adventurers with camels and guides, but Udlara renegotiated with the agents as they arrived.
